quote: The best way to understanding is a few good examples. – Isaac Newton
fact: In 10 minutes, a hurricane releases more energy than all the world’s nuclear weapons combined.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
My friend keeps telling me "Cheer up. You aren't stuck in a deep hole in the ground, filled with water."
I know he means well.
